import React, { useState } from 'react' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; import InputGroup from 'react-bootstrap/InputGroup'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; export const NewChat = () => { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const { register, handleSubmit, watch, formState: { errors } } = useForm({ mode: "onChange" }); const onSubmit = data => console.log(data); return ( <>
Create Chat Room Give a home to your ideas. Invite friends & hold discussions. Create a chat room
{errors.admin_name &&
{"NOOOO"}
}
) } export default NewChat
